title: (Happy Path) : Solicitor successfully Requests NoC for a non-represented litigant - No auto-approval applies
specs: Mario - to initiate a case on his own behalf via a citizen facing application
Dil - with a solicitor role for the same jurisdiction as that of a case initiated by Mario
is made by Dil to place an NOC Request in order to become Mario's representative on C1
contains all correct answers in the correct formats
